attributes.additional_details:
I propose that Bill Bratton, the former police commissioner of New York and Los Angeles, who first used Zero Tolerance with great effect over there, be given the chance to sort out the London Met. It seems David Cameron was quite keen to go along with this proposal, but was jumped apon and the offer squashed by Teresa May!!!
Lets give Bill Bratton a chance, he wants to do it, so lets give him a chance!
